# survivalauc

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Codecov test coverage](https://codecov.io/gh/tidymodels/survivalauc/branch/master/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/tidymodels/survivalauc?branch=master)
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/tidymodels/survivalauc/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/tidymodels/survivalauc/actions)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of survivalauc is to provide a function to calculate analternative method for estimating the time-dependent area under the ROC curve (AUC), sensitivity and specificity proposed in Chambless and Diao (Statistics in Medicine, 2006; 25, 3474â€“3486).

## Installation

You can install the released version of survivalauc from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("survivalauc")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("tidymodels/survivalauc")
```
